Desc.eng: A continuous attack that deals fire damage in a 1.5 meter wide, 14 meter long streak.

effect0.eng: Hit (Fire):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ per second \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_, but mana cost is also increased by %manabonus_.
Targets are ignited for 5 seconds, taking %dot_ of the original flame damage each second.
Enemies hit by the flame are slowed by 30% for %durationbonus_ seconds (once per skill activation).
Mana cost is decreased by %manabonus_.
Damage is increased by %damagebonuspersec_ per second while the skill is continuously used.
You gain %desperateburn_ bonus damage reduction while casting.
Enemies struck permanently lose %resistreduction_ of their damage resistances each second. (This includes immune creatures.)
Launches 10 rockets at the target dealing damage within 2 meters. The damage listed is for one rocket (and they never miss).

Cooldown is reduced by %cooldown_ seconds.
Enemies have a %knockbackchance_% to be knocked down.
The rockets travel %rocketspeed_% faster.
An additional %aoerocketcount_ rockets are launched and they will hit multiple enemies in a %aoeradius_ meters larger target area.

Launches a grenade up in the air releasing a cluster of bombs that rain down around you in a large area. Each bomb deals Physical and Fire damage to enemies within 2 meters. The bombardment lasts for 8 seconds.

Cooldown is reduced by %cooldown_ seconds.
The bombardment lasts %bombcount_ seconds longer.
The explosion radius of the bombs is increased by %blastradius_ meters.
Launches a hail of projectiles damaging all enemies in a 50° arc in front of you. The damage gradually decreases past 2 meters, dropping to zero at a 14 meters.

Increases Critical Damage (even beyond the maximum limit)

Targets may be knocked down.
Increases Critical Hit Chance (even beyond the maximum limit)

effect0.eng: Critical Hit Chance is increased by %criticalchance_.

Desc.eng: Places a protective ring of 5 frost mines dealing ice damage within 2 meters when triggered. Freezes enemies for 1 second, then slows them down by 30% for 3 more seconds. Laying new mines will destroy existing arrays.

effect1.eng: Enemies struck are frozen for 1 second and then slowed by %slow_% for 3 seconds.

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies are frozen for an additional %freezeduration_ seconds.
Enemies gain %physicalvulnerability_ physical vulerability for 5 seconds.
An additional %minecount_ mines are deployed.
Increases the slow effect by %slowbonus_%.
Mana cost is reduced by %manacost_%.
The slow effect lasts an additional %slowduration_ seconds.

Launches a mine which arms itself with a 2 second delay and deals poison damage for 5 seconds within 1.5 meters when triggered. Targets are also afflicted with 25% vulnerability for 10 seconds. (A maximum of 3 mines permitted, laying a 4th will destroys the one you created first.)

effect0.eng: %attack_ initial Poison damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

Launches a mine which arms itself with a 2 second delay and deals fire damage for 5 seconds within 3 meters when triggered. Targets are ignited. (A maximum of 3 mines permitted, laying a 4th will destroys the one you created first.)

effect1.eng: DOT (Fire):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %dotweapondamage_ per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscaleDOT_

Cuts the flow of time by half while you remain able to act normally. Also increases your damage for the duration.

effect0.eng: The shield has %shieldmaxhp_ additional hit points.

Desc.eng: %shieldcharge_ shield power regenerated each second, on a %chargedelay_ second regeneration delay.
%rechargechance_ chance to recharge instantly when depleted.

You raise your shield to block all damage that originates in a 180° arc in front of you. While blocking, you cannot attack or move. Each incoming attack increases your Retaliation Value depending on the damage blocked. When you stop blocking, you deal increased damage with the next strike based on your Retaliation Value. Note that area attacks cannot be blocked.
Attackers have a %stunchance_ chance to be stunned for 2 seconds.
Retaliation Value charges %blockpoints_ faster.
Each attack regenerates %heal_ of your maximum health in the first %healdurationlimit_ seconds of blocking.
Increases your maximum Retaliation Value by %blockpoolmax_%.
Each blocked attack has a %ragechance_ chance to generate a Rage point.
Blocking increases the Retaliation Value %blockpoints_ faster.
There is a %undepletechance_ chance that your attacks do not deplete your Retaliation value.
Strikes a single target for heavy melee damage. If you keep attacking the same target, every subsequent strike deals 15% increased damage, stacking up to 30 times.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Target is stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Target is afflicted with %vulnerability_ vulnerability for 5 seconds.
Smashing Blow powerups cost %powerupcost_ less Rage.
Each strike restores %heal_ of your maximum health.
Each strike generates %rageperkill_ Rage, this only works when the rage gain reaches level 3.
The target is slowed by %massslow_ for 5 seconds. The duration increases with multiple strikes.
You blink forward up to 10 meters and strike a single target. The target is slain instantly, if the damage exceeds 60% of his current health.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The target is unable to cast spells for %nocastduration_ seconds.
The attack gains a 2 meter damage radius that deals %areadamage_ damage.
Decreases the health threshold for instant kills by %actualhppercentdamagedealt_.
Increases the maximum blink range by %castdistance_ meters.
The target is knocked down if you attack from at least %minknockdowndist_ meters away (some enemies may be immune to this).
Mana cost is reduced by %manacost_.

You spin around while moving towards the cursor, damaging all enemies in your path within 2 meters. Dealt damage increases by 20% and Mana cost also increases per second. The damage output is based on your attack rate.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Area of effect is increased by %range_ meters.
Each hit recharges %manaperhit_ Mana.
Mana cost is reduced to %manacost_.
Each hit heals you for %hpperhit_ of your maximum health.
Movement speed is increased by %slowdecrease_.
Defense is increased by %defense_ while the skill is active.
You fade into the Ink and burst forward with blinding speed. Enemies in your path take shock damage and are knocked down. (Powerful enemies may resist the knockdown.)

effect0.eng: Move to the mouse cursor in a split second (obstacles will stop you).

effect1.eng: Enemies in your Path (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

An explosion occurs at the end of the path dealing %aoedamagepercent_ of the original damage to enemies within 3 meters.
Enemies struck are stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.
Damage path width is increased by %widthbonus_ meters.
A field of razor sharp spikes emerge from the ground in front of you, damaging enemies within 5 meters in a 120 degree arc.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Critical Damage is increased by %criticaldamage_.
Enemies struck have %physicalresist_ less physical resistance for 3 seconds.
Elite, Champion and Boss enemies take %damagespecial_ more damage.
Area of effect increased by %range_ meters.
Reduces the retaliation use of Spike Strike by an additional %depletedecrease_.
Enemies struck are slowed by %massslow_ for 5 seconds.

Area of effect is increased by %range_ meters.
Enemies within the area of effect deal %damagereduction_ less damage.

You and all your allies within 10 meters gain a Defense and Resistances bonus (calculated from your stats).

Launches energy bolts at a rate of 3 per second while the skill is active. The bolts hit the nearest enemy unless you have a direct target. When the skill is inactivate an extra energy bolt is generated every second, up to a maximum of 3.

Summons an invulnerable, three-headed Fire Hydra. Attacks a single target, deals fire damage. The creature does not block movement.

You create a 2 meter thick wall of fire by drawing on the ground. It can be of any shape or length, but the longer the wall, the more Mana it consumes. (Base Mana cost is 20 which doubles with each additional meter.) Enemies leaving area of effect are burning for 5 seconds, taking 50% of the original damage per second. Enemies killed by the wall create lesser Fire Hydras (not more than 6).

Burning damage is increased by %burningdamagebonus_.
Mana cost is reduced by %manacostdecrease_.

You create a 2 meter thick wall of frost by drawing on the ground. It can be of any shape or length, but the longer the wall, the more Mana it consumes. (Base Mana cost is 20 which doubles with each additional meter.) Enemies passing through the wall take ice damage and are frozen for 3 seconds. Enemies resisting the effect are slowed by 50% for 3 seconds. Targets cannot be affected by another wall of frost for 10 seconds.

Creates an otherworldly explosion around you dealing arcane damage within 6 meters. Then 10 Ink Meteors rain down from the sky to the same area, each dealing physical damage within 2 meters. Finally, each meteor spawns 2-3 Netherhounds which will attack enemies for 6 seconds.

A bolt of lightning strikes the target, dealing lightning damage to all within a 2 meters radius. The spell can be charged to increase the area of effect (by keeping the mouse button pressed) to a maximum of 5 meters (1 meter per second). You cannot move while charging.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies are shocked for %stunduration_ seconds.

You can perform an Ink Jump to the designated location instantly. Can be used frequently but each jump reserves some of your Mana.

debuffdesc.eng: Ink Leap upkeep. Maximum mana decreased.

effect1.eng: Mana upkeep: %manareserve_ of maximum Mana per jump for %manatime_ seconds.

Upon arrival you deal %arriveblastattack_ damage (%arriveblastweapondamage_ of Weapon Damage) to enemies within 3 meters.
As you Ink Jump away %mirrorcount_ mirror images are created who fight for you for 20 seconds. The mirror images have 50% of your health and deal damage equal to 80% of your Weapon Damage.
Mana upkeep is reduced by %manadecrease_.
Upkeep time is reduced by %manatimedecrease_ seconds.
Each jump generates %rage_ Rage.
Each jump restores %heal_ of your maximum health.

Your Dismemberbots, Assault Mechanoids and Pocket Mechanoids explode, causing physical damage to enemies within 2 meters. They also leave a mine behind that arms itself after 2 seconds and explodes when triggered. The mines deal 50% damage of the original blast.

Mana cost reduced by %manacostdecrease_.
Shadow marks increase damage by %markdamagebonus_.
A burst of lifeforce draining energy from the shadow world damages all enemies within 6 meters. Any shadow marks on the target gets destroyed while increasing the damage effect by 25%.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Area of effect is increased by %radiusbonus_ meters.
You instantly gain %heal_ of your maximum health.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Targets killed generate secondary explosions that deal %deathblastdamage_ of the original damage within 2 meters.
Mana cost is reduced by %manacostdecrease_.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.
Creates a malevolent aura around you in a 5 meter radius. All enemies with shadow marks take continuous damage within the aura. (The marks are not destroyed.)

effect0.eng: Aura (Arcane):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Duration is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Area of effect is increased by %radiusbonus_ meters.
Enemies within the aura have a %markchance_ chance to gain an extra shadow mark each second.
Enemies are afflicted with %vulnerability_ vulnerability per shadow mark.
Enemies within the aura are slowed %chill_. The effect increases for each shadow mark on an enemy.
Cooldown is decreased by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.

You enter the cloaked form and while moving you leave a 1 meter wide poison streak behind. The streak turns into a poisonous cloud for 6 seconds when you reappear. Enemies who enter the streak take continuous damage for 5 seconds (does not stack).

effect0.eng: %sptattack_ Poison damage (%sptweapondamage_ of Weapon Damage) per sec

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies are afflicted with %vulnerability_ vulnerability while poisoned.
Enemies are slowed by %chill_ while poisoned.
The duration of the poison streak is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.
Increases poison damage duration.
Increases duration of the poison streak.
Decreases Mana cost.
Decreases cooldown.

You enter the cloaked form and summon two shadow warriors. The warriors will use the Shadow Twirl attack on targets and will try to switch to a new target after generating 6 shadow marks. They have the same health, defense and resistances as you, but their damage depends on the level of this skill. Summoning new warriors will destroy the old ones.

effect0.eng: Shadow warrior damage: %attack_ Physical damage (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage)

effect1.eng: Shadow warrior health: %maxhp_ (%castermaxhpmul_ of of your health)

Desc.eng: The warriors' damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The warriors' health is increased by %hpbonus_.
The warriors deal %blastdamage_ times of their attack damage in a 3 meter radius when they die.
The warriors have a %resurrectchance_ chance to resurrect immeadiately after they die.
The warriors' movement speed is increased by %speed_.
The warriors have a %additionalmarkchance_ chance to generate an additional shadow mark with each strike.
Cooldown to summon the warriors is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.

Summons 3 Seekermatons looking for enemies within 40 meters, following, illuminating and afflicting them with vulnerability. An enemy may only be targeted by one seekermaton at any time. The seekermatons cannot be damaged and remain indefinitely.

effect1.eng: -%slow_ movement speed to targets.

Desc.eng: Vulnerability effect is further increased by %vulnerabilitybonus_.
Marked Enemies are slowed by %massslow_.
Summons %cikeszcountbonus_ additional Seekermatons.
Marked enemies take %dotDamageBonus_ additional damage from damage over time effects.
Attacks on marked enemies have +%critChance_ chance to result in Critical Hits (even beyond the maximum limit).
Your Seekermatons attract the attention of as many enemies as possible for 3 seconds then explode. The explosions deals damage within 3.5 meters of each Seekermaton.

effect0.eng: Explosion (fire, Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Area of effect is increased by %blastradiusbonus_ meters.
Enemies struck are stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Enemies struck are ignited for 5 seconds, taking %dot_ of the original explosion damage each second.
The Seekermatons have a %resurrectchance_ chance to resurrect immediately after the explosion.
Enemies struck are afflicted with %vulnerability_ vulnerability for 5 seconds.
Each kill generates +%ragePerKill_ Rage.
You fire a precision shot with a 2.5 second delay by holding down the mouse button. The shot deals extreme damage unless you release the shot prematurely. Premature shots deals minor damage.

effect0.eng: Precision Shot (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: 1500% \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscaleSniper_

effect1.eng: Premature Shot (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: 250% \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The shot can pierce a maximum of %piercecount_ targets.
Critical chance is increased by %critchance_ (even beyond the maximum limit).
%aimtimedecrease_ aim time by on targets marked by Seekermatons.
Increases premature shot damage by %damagebonus_.
Critical chance is increased by %criticalhit_.
Precision Shot powerups cost %powerupcostdecrease_ less Rage.
Fires a powerful shot that splinters when it hits a target, sending out shards to up to 4 targets within 5 meters. Each shard ricochets up to 5 times.

effect0.eng: Ricochet Blast (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: 250% \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

effect1.eng: Ricochet (Physical):\n- Damage Effectiveness: 20% \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

Desc.eng: Increases the damage of the initial hit (not shard damage) by %singledamagebonus_.
The shards deal %ricochetdamagebonus_ more damage.
Slows all targets hit by the shards by %slow_ for 3 seconds.
Increases the radius shards will seek out targets by %searchradius_.
Increases the number of shards by %fragmentcount_.
Increases the number of times shards ricochet by %ricochetcount_.
Increases the damage of the initial hit (not shard damage) by %singledamagebonus_.

Shoots an explosive charge which deals damage within 3 meters. The explosion also generates a toxic cloud that persists for 5 seconds. Enemies stepping into the cloud are poisoned and take additional damage for 10 seconds, and are also afflicted with 25% vulnerability. The effects of multiple shots do not stack.

effect1.eng: Poisoned enemies take Poison Damage (%dot_ of the damage of explosion) per second.

Desc.eng: Poison damage over time is increased by %dotbonus_.
Toxic cloud duration is increased by %dotdurationbonus_ seconds.
Enemies in the cloud deal %damagereduction_ less damage (this even affects powerful enemies).
Poison damage over time percentage is increased by %dotbonus_.
Toxic cloud duration is increased by %clouddurationbonus_ seconds.
Area of effect is increased by %radiusbonus_ meters.
Enemies have their Poison Resistance reduced by %doubledotchance_.
Fires a bullet piercing all targets in its path, dealing ice damage. Each impact creates ice shards that hit every enemy within 4 meters of the impact. The shards deal 75% of the original damage.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Targets are frozen for %freezeduration_ seconds.
Increases the range Shards will seek targets by %searchradius_.
Increases damage on frozen or slowed targets by %frozenvulnerability_.
Slows targets down by %slow_.
Targets are afflicted with %vulnerability_ vulnerability for 5 seconds (does not stack).
The shards seek targets %searchradius_ meters further.

Creates a bubble of personal time while the world stands still. The bubble starts to shrink as you move around and disappears after walking some distance. Perfoming attacks or using skills counts as if you have moved 4 meters. A few actions like shuffling inventory items are without penalty. When the bubble is gone, time returns to normal. You also gain a substantial damage bonus for the duration.

effect0.eng: Time bubble dissipates after moving %skillduration_ meters.

effect1.eng: %postcalcfurydamagebonus_ bonus damage.

Desc.eng: The damage bonus is increased by %damagebonus_.
Each time a skill is used, there is a %freeactionchance_ chance that the action is free.
Critical Damage is increased by %critdamage_ (even beyond maximum limit).
Critical Chance is increased by %critchance_ (even beyond maximum limit).
Each kill generates %ragebonus_ Rage.
Each meter's worth of action regenerates %manapertick_ of your maximum mana.
Each meter's worth of action restores %hppertick_ of maximum health.
Fires a heavy explosive charge a short distance that deals damage within 3 meters, then using the kickback you flip backwards several meters.

effect0.eng: Explosion (Physical, Fire):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ \n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

effect1.eng: %distance_ meter vault distance.

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies struck are stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Enemies struck are afflicted with %vulnerability_ vulnerability for 5 seconds.
Area of effect of the explosion is increased by %blastradiusbonus_ meters.
Vault distance is increased by %distancebonus_ meters.
The explosion ignites enemies for 3 seconds, who take an additional %dot_ of the original missile damage each second.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.
Standing still for 3 seconds bestows a substantial damage bonus.
Adds a %dodge_ defense bonus to the effects of the skill.
Critical Hit Chance is increased by %critchance_ (even beyond the maximum limit).
Adds a dodge bonus to the effects of the skill.
Increases Critical Damage (even beyond the maximum limit).
Increases Critical Hit Chance (even beyond the maximum limit).
Increases attack rate.
The bonus is applied from 90% of maximum Rage.
At maximum Rage you gain 1% Critical Hit Chance.

effect1.eng: Magic Find Chance is increased by %modifiervalue_(item_find_chance)%.

Desc.eng: Also increases the chance to find Essences by 10%.
Also increases the chance to find Essences by 15%.
When activating powerups, there is a 5% chance that you regain spent Rage points immediately.
You gain 1 Mana per Rage point spent.
The cooldown for mana potions is reduced by 10%.
Each killed enemy recharges 1% of your maximum Mana.
Mana cost of all mine type skills is decreased by 10%.
Cooldown of all mine type skills is decreased by 10%.
There is a 5% chance that negative effects don't affect you at all.
Decreases incoming damage from duration based harmful effects by 20%.
The cooldown for health potions is reduced by 10%.
Each killed enemy heals you for 1% of your maximum Hit Points.
You gain another 10% physical damage when you are below 30% health.
The Physical Resistance penalty is lowered to 20%.
Armors provide 20% additional Defense.
All of your resistances are increased by 5% of your Defense value.
Grants 10% additional Defense against powerful enemies.
Powerful enemies are 10% more likely to drop epic, set or legendary items.
Upkeep is reduced to 10% of maximum Mana.
Fire elemental damage bonuses on your spellcuffs count as if they were 30% stronger.
Upkeep is reduced to 10% of maximum Mana.
Ice elemental damage bonuses on your spellcuffs count as if they were 30% stronger.
Upkeep is reduced to 15% of maximum Mana.
Elemental and Arcane damage bonuses on your spellcuffs and staves count as if they were 30% stronger.
Upkeep skills cost 10% less Mana.
Upkeep skills do 5% more damage.
All slow, stun, freeze, shock and confusion effects you create have a 10% chance to last twice as long.
You deal 10% more damage to slowed, stunned, frozen, shocked or confused enemies.
Mana cost of all mechanical ally creation skills is reduced by 10%.
Your mechanical allies gain 10% resistance agains all forms of damage.
Mana cost of all turret creation skills is reduced by 10%.
Your turrets gain 10% resistance agains all forms of damage.
Your actual Crowd Control Resistance is increased by 30%.
Enemy creatures also have their resistances reduced by 5%.
The bonus is applied if no enemies are within 8 meters.
If only a single enemy is within distance, you still gain 50% of the bonus.
You have active flame serpents that require upkeep, decreasing your maximum Mana.
You are bleeding and will continue to suffer Physical Damage.
You are shocked. Your movement speed and damage is reduced by 50%.
You are slowed down by 30%.
You are slowed down by 30%.
You are slowed down by 40%.
You are slowed down by 20%.
Your damage and movement speed are decreased by 50%.
You have been poisoned. You are taking continuous poison damage.
You are taking continuous ice damage.
You are frozen for 3 seconds.
You are taking continuous fire damage.
Creates a rat pit that continuously summons rats for 60 seconds or until destroyed. The rats fight on your side.
You are marked! You are more vulnerable to damage from all sources!
A totem is slowing your movement and you are also taking continuous damage!
Kills all enemy creatures present in the Void Cathedral, except the Faceless One, who takes 5000 damage.
All enemies within 10 meters prioritize you as their target for 10 seconds. You also gain a bonus to your Defense for the duration.
Range of the taunt is increased by %radiusbonus_ meters.
Taunted enemies are afflicted with %vulnerability_ vulnerability for the duration.
Duration is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.
Range is increased by %radiusbonus_ meters.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.
You raise your shield to block a large portion of the damage that originates in a 180° arc in front of you. While blocking, you cannot attack or move. Note that area attacks cannot be blocked.
Attackers have a %stunchance_ chance to be stunned for 2 seconds.
Each attack regenerates %heal_ of your maximum health in the first %healdurationlimit_ seconds of blocking.
Attackers are afflicted with %vulnerability_ vulnerability for 4 seconds.
Blocked attacks have a %ragechance_ chance to yield 1 Rage.
Each block reflects %reflectdamage_ of the damage back to the attacker.
Strikes a single target dealing physical damage and tag it with a shadow mark.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
The target receives %markcountbonus_ additional shadow marks.
The target is stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
There is a %additionalmarkchance_ chance that the target receives an additional shadow mark.
Shadow Rend powerups cost %powerupcostdecrease_ less Rage.
Creates a ring of disruptive energy that deals arcane damage within 3 meters. Enemies within are also slowed and receive a shadow mark each second.

effect0.eng: Energy Ring (Arcane):\n- Damage Effectiveness: %weapondamage_ per second\n- Total Damage: +%lvlscale_

effect1.eng: Targets are slowed by %chill_.

Desc.eng: Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
%moremarkchance_ for an extra shadow mark when enemies are tagged by the spell.
Enemies are slowed by an additional %chillbonus_.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.
Enemies are slowed by an additional %chillbonus_ permanently.

You fade into the shadow world, making yourself invisible. After the duration has expired (or you attack a target) you immediately snap out of your cloaked form and receive an Ambush Bonus, increasing your damage considerably.
You become invulnerable for %invulnerabilityduration_ seconds when you emerge from cloak.
You remain in cloaked form for an additional %durationbonus_ seconds.
You regenerate %manaregen_ mana each second while in cloaked form.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.
Umbra Form powerups cost 1 less Rage.

You release a shockwave of dark energy while entering your cloaked form. The shockwave deals physical damage in a 3 meter radius. Returning from the shadow world gives you an Ambush Bonus, increasing your damage considerably.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
You remain in cloaked form for an additional %durationbonus_ seconds.
Enemies struck by the shockwave are stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Mana cost is reduced by %manacostdecrease_.
Cooldown is reduced by %cooldowndecrease_ seconds.
You perform an Ink Jump to the designated location instantly and also enter cloaked form.

effect0.eng: Jump to location in cloaked form

Desc.eng: Jumping away stuns enemies for %stunduration_ seconds within 2 meters.
Jumping away tags enemies with %markcount_ shadow mark within 2 meters.
Jumping away afflicts enemies with %vulnerability_ vulnerability for 5 seconds within 2 meters.
Jumping away heals you for %heal_ of your max HP.
Jumping away creates a noxious cloud for 5 seconds, dealing poison damage within 2 meters (%weapondamage_ of Weapon Damage).
Increases the maximum time you can spend in cloaked form and your health and mana regeneration rate while you are in it.

effect0.eng: Cloaked form duration is increased by %durationbonus_ seconds.

effect1.eng: Heals %hpregen_ of your maximum health each second.

effect2.eng: Regenerates %manaregen_ of your maximum Mana each second.

Desc.eng: Your movement speed is increased by 10% while in cloaked form.
Your movement speed is increased by a further 15% while in cloaked form.
The movement speed of all enemies with shadow marks is decreased. (Multiple shadow marks stack.)
Afflicted targets slow all other enemies within 2 meters.
Enemies are stunned for 5 seconds when they accumulate 10 shadow marks.
All enemies with shadow marks become more vulnerable to damage. (Multiple shadow marks stack.)

effect0.eng: Targets afflicted with %vulnerability_ vulnerability per shadow mark.

Desc.eng: Enemies immediately take damage equal to 500% of your total damage when they accumulate 10 shadow marks. This damage can crit.
Enemies extend their vulnerability to all other enemies within 2 meters of them.
Whenever a shadow mark is destroyed by a skill, there is a chance that it is immediately recreated on the target.
There is a 25% chance that a target becomes stunned for 2 seconds when a mark is recreated on it.
The chance that a target becomes stunned when a mark is recreated on it is increased by another 25%.
You continuously gain some rage while you are in cloaked form.

effect0.eng: %ragechance_ chance to gain 5 Rage each second.

Desc.eng: After you exit cloaked form, you continue to gain rage for half the time you spent cloaked.
Increases the Rage gain rate by 2.
All of your minions are created with a self-repair module, allowing them to regain a portion of their maximum health each second.

effect0.eng: Your minions heal %hpregen_ of their maximum health each second

Desc.eng: Your minions have a 2% chance every 1 second to instantly regain all of their health.
The chance that your minions regain all of their health is increased by another 2%.
All your minions (both mechanoid and turret types) within 5 meters gain bonus damage.
All your minions within range regenerate 1% of their maximum health per second.
The area of effect is increased by 1 meter.
Every point of Rage you spend heals you.

effect0.eng: Regain %heal_ Hit points per Rage point spent.

Desc.eng: When activating powerups, there is a 5% chance that you regain spent Rage points immediately.
You gain 1 Mana for each Rage point you spend.
Reduced cooldown for creating minions and turrets.
All turrets gain an additional 25% HP.
All mechanoids (except turrets) gain an additional 25% HP.
Your turrets and mechanoids gain extra hitpoints
Constructing mechanoids costs 10% less Mana.
Your mechanoids' health is increased by 10%.
You gain increased HP regeneration after standing still for 2 seconds.

effect0.eng: Heals %hpregenbonus_ of your maximum health each second

Damage taken is reduced by 5% while not moving.
Launches a cluster of 2 rockets at the target damaging enemies within 2 meters. The rockets always hit and do the listed damage individually.

Releases a violent shockwave of energy dealing damage within a 6 meter radius.

Enemies struck are stunned for %stunduration_ seconds.
Blast radius is increased by %radiusbonus_ meters.
Mana cost is reduced by 20%.

Lays 3 incendiary mines around you. The mines cause fire damage to enemies within 2 meters and also igniting them for 5 seconds for 40% of the original damage per second. Laying new mines destroys any mines you've previously created.
Damage is increased by %damagebonus_.
Enemies struck burn %dotduration_ seconds longer.
Each hit from a mine yields %rageperhit_ Rage.

1 additional mine is deployed.
Increases the weapon damage of flamethrower-type skills.
